name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル3：飢餓地獄

keyEvents.title: Impel Down Staff Track Intruders
keyEvents.description: The prison staff successfully identify Bentham and Galdino's real names while tracking the escaped prisoners through Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the prison's surveillance capabilities and the staff's growing awareness of the infiltration.

keyEvents.title: Minotaurus Confronts Intruders
keyEvents.description: Minotaurus, the first Jailer Beast, appears on Level 3 to stop Luffy and his allies from descending further into the prison.
keyEvents.significance: Level 3 becomes the battleground for the first major confrontation with a Jailer Beast.

keyEvents.title: Minotaurus Defeated on Level 3
keyEvents.description: Through teamwork, Luffy, Bentham, Buggy, and Galdino defeat Minotaurus on Level 3, allowing them to continue their descent.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the first successful defeat of a Jailer Beast, clearing the path to Level 4.

description: Level 3, known as Starvation Hell, is where prisoners with bounties of 50,000,000 Berries or higher are kept. The level is characterized by extreme heat rising from Level 4 below, and prisoners are given minimal food and water to keep them in a near-death state.
climate: Extremely hot due to heat rising from Level 4

name.english: Impel Down - Level 4: Burning Heat Hell
name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル4：焦熱地獄

keyEvents.title: Magellan Orders Forces to Level 4
keyEvents.description: Chief Warden Magellan strategically orders all forces to mobilize to Level 4 to trap the intruders when they descend from Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Level 4 as the planned location for the major confrontation between Magellan and the escapees.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Sees Level 4 From Above
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Bentham reach the pit leading to Level 4 and witness the scorching Burning Heat Hell below, resembling a boiling pot.
keyEvents.significance: First visual introduction of Level 4, foreshadowing the extreme danger awaiting the intruders.

description: Level 4, known as Burning Heat Hell or Blazing Hell, is defined by a vast cauldron of boiling blood heated by an equally massive fire underneath. This level serves as the main torture area of Impel Down, where prisoners from any level may be brought for punishment. The overwhelming heat makes it one of the most dangerous levels.
climate: Extreme heat from boiling blood cauldron and massive fire
currentStatus: Active prison level and torture chamber

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル6：無限地獄

keyEvents.title: Ace Begs Luffy Not to Come
keyEvents.description: Imprisoned in Level 6, Portgas D. Ace overhears the announcement about intruders and desperately begs Luffy not to come rescue him.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Ace's emotional state and his concern for Luffy's safety, emphasizing the bond between the brothers.

description: Level 6, known as Eternal Hell, is the deepest level of Impel Down where the most dangerous criminals are imprisoned. These prisoners are so dangerous that their very existence is erased from history. Portgas D. Ace is currently being held here awaiting his execution.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - 入口

keyEvents.title: Hancock Departs Impel Down
keyEvents.description: Boa Hancock and Vice Admiral Momonga return to the surface after Hancock's visit. Domino removes Hancock's handcuffs and returns her belongings.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the completion of Hancock's mission to smuggle Luffy into the prison while maintaining her cover as a Warlord.

description: The surface entrance of Impel Down where visitors are processed and where the prison staff maintain security checkpoints. This is where Warlords and other official visitors enter and exit the facility.
